'''In the Light, Beneath the Shadow''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing a puzzle on [[Dainichi Mikoshi]]. It is submitted at the end of the {{Quest|Collection of Dragons and Snakes}}, and can be interacted with after the quest completes to obtain Vol. 5 of [[The Byakuyakoku Collection]].
